law.catch_line: Berries and small fruits shall be offered and exposed for sale and sold by weight, or by measure in ...
law.text: Berries and small fruits shall be offered and exposed for sale and sold by weight, or by measure in open containers having capacities of 1/2 pint, 1 pint, or 1 quart, dry measure. The labeling requirements of § 11-306 of this subtitle do not apply to these open containers.
